1352290.name: Anime Squad
1352290.description:
Anime Squad is a fun FPS/TPS game that can be played online. The game features a scenario where anime girls fight in the anime world. Players fight against their enemies on different maps equipped with unique weapons. The game offers many different map options for players to enjoy for hours.



Players can move quickly in the battlefield thanks to the car driving system. Players who play the flag capture mode have a lot of fun. Additionally, the game features a rank system that helps players track their character's level of development. Join the battle now to increase your rank and intimidate your opponents!



Anime Squad can be described as a game filled with war, action, and entertainment. The game's graphics and sound effects are immersive and appealing to players, making it an ideal option for anime fans. The most significant feature of Anime Squad is the battle of anime characters.



Players can control many popular anime characters, such as anime girls. Enjoy the fun world of Anime Squad with cute graphics. There are loads of fun activities to do on most maps. You can think of these activity ideas yourself. You can go up on the roofs and take pictures, you can find the bugs in the game. You can search for Easter eggs!
1352290.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文, 俄语, 土耳其语
